title: ok​
content: </> Result:ok() → boolean Returns whether the Result has returned the values of the Future successfully or not.

title: error​
content: </> Result:error() → boolean If the Result is an Error, returns true.

title: isPending​
content: </> Future:isPending() → boolean Polls the Future and returns true if the Future is pending.

title: isReady​
content: </> Future:isReady() → boolean Polls the Future and returns true if the Future is ready.

title: output​
content: </> Future:output() → ...T? If the Future is ready, returns the results ...T. Otherwise, returns nil.

title: output​
content: </> Future:output() → Result When the Result of the Future is ready, calling output will return a Result.
